variants.Description in input context: The variant results in an amino acid substitution (glutamine to stop codon) at position 524.

Material used.Material Name: Wild-type TRPV4 plasmid and TRPV4_Q524X mutant plasmid

Readout description.Result Description: The protein expression of TRPV4\_Q524X was significantly lower compared to the wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each sample.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type TRPV4 plasmid was used as a positive control for protein expression.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control for protein expression.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: T-test was used to compare the protein expression levels between wild-type and TRPV4_Q524X.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% of the wild-type level.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% of the wild-type level.
